entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:37 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Armstrong Airport 08:04 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.5°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.4°C
Wind: E 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h late this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
